General.Name: G2Power Co. Ltd.
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: G2Power Co. Ltd researches, develops, manufactures, and sells photovoltaic solar inverters, energy storage systems, and switchgear in South Korea. It offers photovoltaic power generation systems, power conversion systems, connection boards, solar radiation sensors, monitoring systems, and Electric fire monitoring devices in connection boards; and Arc monitoring and diagnosis services on the switchgear, transformer monitoring and diagnosis, switchgear total monitoring and diagnosis, remote monitoring and diagnosis functions, Internet of things-based monitoring diagnosis, and switchgear partial discharge diagnosis services. In addition, the company provides building automation systems, wireless remote controls, electric demand controls, power conditioning and management systems, energy management systems, PD monitoring solutions, and battery Arc monitoring diagnosis services. Its products have applications in schools, factories, shopping centers, apartment hospitals, water and sewage treatment plants, ports, airports, railways, electric motors, lights, electric heating equipment, and various power facilities. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Hwaseong, South Korea.
